page.title: 14CAPENHURST-RECREATION
page.content: The impact of Leisure Centres on the area is obvious.Both adults & children travel to centres at Chester,Ellesmere Port,Neston & Deeside where the most popular activities are swimming, badminton,ice & roller skating,ballet & disco dancing.Cars are used as there is no convenient public transport.The two works clubs in Capenhurst at BNFL and The Electricity Council Research Centre are well used by villagers as there is no local public house.Locals also make use of their sporting facilities such as bowling greens.For young people a weekly Youth Club has started meeting in the Village Hall. Chester has the overall best service for entertainment with night clubs, cinemas,dico halls,Bingo,Leisure Centres and Museums.With its large variety of shops,pubs and eating places it is ideal for a family outing
